msbt.message: These are so totally some of my favorite clothes!Do you like the clothes you're wearing, ?
Of course!
They're good enough.
I wouldn't miss them.
I thought so! Because the clothes you have on now really suit you!When it comes to fashion I. Know. Everything.

Just good enough? Really? I think you're always wearing super trendy clothes!In factyou're getting a little TOO fashionable.I guess I need to up my game if I'm going to keep my title of Most Fash Ever!
Really? I was for sure positive you loved those clothes!Well, you might not like them, but you make them look good! You're, like, a fashion guru!
Hey, ? What do you think would look best on me?
Skinny jeans. Shorts. Overalls.
Flare skirt. Pleated skirt. Tulle skirt.
No idea.
Duh! Right? A skirt is nice, but I could totes rock something different instead!Maybe I'll try something a little more mod!
A skirt! Of course! If you're going to be a pop star like me, you just have to have a fave fab skirt!
It's tough, isn't it? I legit cannot decide!But you know what? I shouldn't try to wear what other folks say to wear. I'll just wear what I want!Hang ondidn't I just ask you?
Hey, I got a fab hypothetical for youImagine, if you will, that you can hear music coming from the house of someone you likeWhat kind of music would you want it to be, ?
Classical.
Rock.
Pop.
Music box.

I <10_5 />KNEW YOU'D SAY THAT!You're totes calm as a string quartet, but also as EXCITING as bass and drums and sometimes a choir.Surprised I know classical music? A pop star needs to know more than just pop! And classical's WAY neat!

Oh yeah! Every wicked guitar solo's gotta have a très solid bass line!You two could rock all day for free! Party for nothing! And keep believing!<10_4 /> Or somethingI've listened to a lot of old rock albums and I love them all. I just confuse the lyrics sometimes!

Pop? Who even likes pop music? I mean, come onI'm kidding! Pop music is awesome! It's fab! It's trendy! It's chic! It's<10_10 />THE BEST THING EVER!<10_9 />If you love pop music, I bet you'd like someone like me<10_4 /> Sorry, my heart belongs to K.K.!
Music box music?I meanif you heard a music box from outside someone's house, then that's one LOUD music box!Huh Maybe if you hooked the music box up to a sound system?<10_4 /> Oh wow! That'd be neat!
Pop quiz!OK, you're going to go to a costume party with a friend What costume do you wear, ?
A black-cat costume!
A vampire costume!
Some full-body tights!
A pumpkin costume!
Oh! I bet you look way fab in your PAW-jamas!Get it? Becausecat costume?<10_4 /> And catshave paws?<10_4 /> You don't get it.
Oh! But aren't you worried everyone would think you're a really bad cook?Get it? Becausechefs use garlic?<10_4 /> And vampireshate garlic?<10_4 /> You don't get it.
Oh wow! That costume sounds really tight!<10_4 /> Get it? 'Cause "tight" can mean "cool"?OK, I admit that sounded a lot funnier in my head. Heh heh.
Oh! I bet you'll look way fab asas a, uhbig-time pumpkin head with a pumpkin for a head!Get it?<10_4 /> UmI don't get it either.<10_4 /> I couldn't think of a good pumpkin joke.
Going out is more fun when your hair is fashionably glam!Do you think your current hairstyle is très fab or le drab, ?
Totally fab!
Totally drab?
Fab? Drab? What?
You ARE totally fab! I'm so glad you think so too!You know, I need to keep up with your style Maybe I'll try a new hairdo!
What? Don't be rude to yourself like that! I think your hair looks super!You know, I think any hairstyle would look good on you. But me? My stylist EARNS their paycheck!

You don't know hairstyle terms? Well, bestie, your hair is amazing. A total 10 out of 10out of 10!But if you want to be a fashion icon like I'm going to be, you'll have to work hard.You need to be able to style your hair two, three, or even eight times a day!That reminds me! I've had this look for more than an hour! I have some styling to do!
